# preferredMediaSelection

**Instance Property**

The default media selections for this asset’s media selection groups.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredMediaSelection: AVMediaSelection { get }
```

## Discussion

Provides an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelection] with the default selections for each of the assets media selection groups.
title: preferredMediaSelection
